title: China's tech giants push toward an $8 trillion metaverse opportunity — one that will be highly regulated - CNBC
content: China's tech giants push toward an $8 trillion metaverse opportunity — one that will be highly regulated  CNBC
description: China's technology giants from Tencent to Alibaba and ByteDance are investing in the metaverse, a market that could be worth $8 trillion in the future.
